name: OAuth Connections Viewer
description: 여러 플랫폼의 OAuth 연결을 한 눈에 확인할 수 있는 확장 프로그램입니다.

scripts.build: npm run prebuild && webpack --mode=production && npm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: cpy manifest.json dist/ && cpy src/*.html dist/ && cpy src/styles/**/* dist/styles/ && cpy src/assets/**/* dist/assets/
scripts.dev:init: rimraf dist && mkdirp dist && cpy manifest.json src/*.html dist/ && cpy src/styles/**/* dist/styles/ && cpy src/assets/**/* dist/assets/
scripts.dev: npm run dev:init && concurrently "webpack --watch --mode=development" "chokidar 'src/styles/**/*.css' -c 'cpy src/styles/**/* dist/styles/'" "chokidar 'src/*.html' -c 'cpy src/*.html dist/'" "chokidar 'cpy src/assets/**/* dist/assets/'"

author: kimhyunmook
